snippet: The four police officers in the Bronx have been stripped of their guns and badges and placed on modified duty as the episode is investigated.
abstract: The four police officers in the Bronx have been stripped of their guns and badges and placed on modified duty as the episode is investigated.
lead_paragraph: Four police officers in the Bronx have been stripped of their guns and badges and placed on modified duty after a video shot by a civilian surfaced of them pummeling a drug suspect, the police said.

headline.main: Officers Pulled Off Street After Video of Beating Surfaces
